data.text: @AndyWoodturner No chillies for me, OH & my boys but we've never had it either, we're more than a bit careful though as all have underlying issues and boys have special needs so don't want to risk them getting it.
@AndyWoodturner Must be all the wood dust and paint fumes I’ve inhaled through my life…

@Donna_Dean we ought to be able to! It must be worth a fortune! This time next year, Rodney*

*Donna
@AndyWoodturner I’ve had 3 close encounters in past two months, one being my husband. I have no idea how I haven’t caught it. Perhaps we can sell our blood platelets?

@AndyWoodturner Have several coughs (got one now), and a throat infection. Do regular tests and never been positive. Nearly all of my colleagues have had it and loads of the children at school but not me. It’s waiting till it can stop me from doing something nice, I bet.
@AndyWoodturner There was two nights last week where I slept badly for no more than 2 hours each night. Last night was a crap sleep too.
@francisfoley strictly speaking, this is also true for me...but last night was particularly bad and I felt like shit this morning
@AndyWoodturner I’ve also never caught COVID19 to the best of my knowledge.
@AndyWoodturner I’d need to file for bankruptcy if I took a COVID19 test every time I slept poorly or hardly at all. 😀
